languages.text: "Обычные суеверия черни. Уверен, этот или эта Заря — шарлатан, бормочущий вирши, которые необразованные последователи принимают за заклинания. В покаянную печь он за это, конечно, должен отправиться. Но это не говорит о каком-либо особом статусе мятежа".

"The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."
languages.original_text: "Обычные суеверия черни. Уверен, этот или эта Заря — шарлатан, бормочущий вирши, которые необразованные последователи принимают за заклинания. В покаянную печь он за это, конечно, должен отправиться. Но это не говорит о каком-либо особом статусе мятежа".

traits.locale_text: "The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a flimflammer muttering some doggerel which their benighted followers think are magic spells. This does, of course, warrant his or her eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it doesn't point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

"The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a flimflammer muttering some doggerel which their benighted followers think are magic spells. This does, of course, warrant his or her eventual burning at the stake. But it doesn't point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

"The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it doesn't point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it doesn't point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

"The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

languages.text: "Der übliche Aberglaube des Pöbels. Diese Aurora ist gewiss nur eine Scharlatanin, die wirres Zeug faselt, welches ihre dämlichen Anhänger für Zaubersprüche halten. Was es natürlich unabdingbar macht, dass sie in naher Zukunft im läuternden Fegefeuer ihre Schuld von sich waschen. Es weist jedoch nicht darauf hin, dass dieser Aufstand irgendetwas Besonderes an sich hätte."
languages.original_text: "The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

traits.locale_text: "Der übliche Aberglaube des Pöbels. Diese Aurora ist gewiss nur eine Scharlatanin, die wirres Zeug faselt, welches ihre dämlichen Anhänger für Zaubersprüche halten. Was es natürlich unabdingbar macht, dass sie in naher Zukunft im läuternden Fegefeuer ihre Schuld von sich waschen. Es weist jedoch nicht darauf hin, dass dieser Aufstand irgendetwas Besonderes an sich hätte."

languages.text: « Les superstitions habituelles de la populace. Je suis certain que cette Aurore n'est qu'une bonimenteuse marmonnant du charabia, que ses adeptes demeurés prennent pour des formules magiques. Cela justifie, bien sûr, qu'ils finissent dans la fournaise de la pénitence. Mais cela n'indique pas que cette insurrection ait quoi que ce soit de spécial. »
languages.original_text: "The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

traits.locale_text: « Les superstitions habituelles de la populace. Je suis certain que cette Aurore n'est qu'une bonimenteuse marmonnant du charabia, que ses adeptes demeurés prennent pour des formules magiques. Cela justifie, bien sûr, qu'ils finissent dans la fournaise de la pénitence. Mais cela n'indique pas que cette insurrection ait quoi que ce soit de spécial. »

languages.text: “不过是乌合之众的迷信罢了。我敢肯定，这个‘极光’就是个江湖骗子，只会念叨几句打油诗，但那群愚蠢的追随者却以为是魔咒。当然，那些人确实都应该丢进忏悔熔炉里活活烧死，但这并不代表这场叛乱有什么特别之处。”
languages.original_text: "The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

traits.locale_text: “不过是乌合之众的迷信罢了。我敢肯定，这个‘极光’就是个江湖骗子，只会念叨几句打油诗，但那群愚蠢的追随者却以为是魔咒。当然，那些人确实都应该丢进忏悔熔炉里活活烧死，但这并不代表这场叛乱有什么特别之处。”

languages.text: 「狂信者のいつもの盲信だ。そのオーロラという奴は、戯言を撒き散らすペテン師で、頭の弱い信者達はそれを魔法の呪文だと思い込んでいるのだろう。こうやって信じ込ませて、ゆくゆくは懺悔の炉で焼かれることを正当化するのだ。しかし、この反乱に特別な何かがあるということにはならない」
languages.original_text: "The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

traits.locale_text: 「狂信者のいつもの盲信だ。そのオーロラという奴は、戯言を撒き散らすペテン師で、頭の弱い信者達はそれを魔法の呪文だと思い込んでいるのだろう。こうやって信じ込ませて、ゆくゆくは懺悔の炉で焼かれることを正当化するのだ。しかし、この反乱に特別な何かがあるということにはならない」

languages.text: «Las supersticiones habituales de la plebe. Estoy seguro de que esta Aurora es una charlatana que suelta algunas tonterías que sus débiles seguidores creen que son hechizos mágicos. Esto, por supuesto, justifica su próxima incineración en el horno de la penitencia. Pero no apunta a que haya nada especial en esta insurrección».
languages.original_text: "The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."

traits.locale_text: «Las supersticiones habituales de la plebe. Estoy seguro de que esta Aurora es una charlatana que suelta algunas tonterías que sus débiles seguidores creen que son hechizos mágicos. Esto, por supuesto, justifica su próxima incineración en el horno de la penitencia. Pero no apunta a que haya nada especial en esta insurrección».

languages.text: "Ayaktakımının alışılagelmiş hurafeleri işte. Eminim ki Aurora denen bu zat, fısıl fısıl martaval okuyan şarlatanın tekidir. Kıt akıllı müritleri de bunu büyü sanıyordur. Elbette bu kadarı bile en nihayetinde kefaret ateşinde yanmalarını gerektirir. Yine de bu hâl, bu isyanın özel bir yanı olduğunu göstermez."
languages.original_text: "The rabble's usual superstitions. I'm sure this Aurora is a charlatan muttering some doggerel, which their dim followers think to be magic spells. This does, of course, warrant their eventual burning in the furnace of penance. But it does not point to there being anything special about this insurgency."
